heroSubtitle: Safe psychological support to understand, protect yourself and regain wellbeing.
trustNote: We work confidentially with sensitivity to your context.
helpBullets: Psychoeducation on violence and its impact
Coordination with community and legal resources
whyUsBullets: Connection to community services when appropriate
whatIs: Domestic violence involves patterns of control, aggression and harm impacting emotional and physical health.
howItFeels: It may feel like constant fear, isolation, guilt and confusion.
howWeHelp: We strengthen your support network, work on safety and rebuild self-esteem and life project.

forWhom.is: Those seeking to understand their situation and make safe decisions.
forWhom.not: Does not replace legal or immediate emergency services.

faq.question: Does therapy replace legal help?
faq.answer: No, it complements emotional care and guides you to resources.

faq.question: Can I attend if I remain in the relationship?
faq.answer: Yes, we work on safety and options at your pace.

emergencyNote: If in immediate danger, call 911 or seek local emergency services.
